terms.text: 50% prepayment, 50% upon delivery to the destination.

hero.title: The treasures of Uzbekistan — dried fruits, herbs, and delicious nuts all in one place.
hero.subtitle: Dried fruits, healing herbs, and tasty nuts — delivered anywhere in the world.

section.subtitle: Our Advantages
section.title: Why Choose Us?
section.description: Bioherbals is a source of natural products for a healthy life. We produce high-quality dried fruits, vegetables, and medicinal herbs, preserving their natural taste, aroma, and benefits. Bioherbals — quality and care in every product.

image.title: Natural Products
image.description: Wholesale of dried fruits, mountain herbs, and nuts grown under the Uzbek sun. Guaranteed high quality and fast delivery.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.description: All products are hand-picked and quality controlled

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Simple and convenient — we deliver your products quickly and efficiently.

certified.title: Certified
certified.description: All necessary certificates and permits are available

partner.title: Reliable Partner
partner.description: We guarantee reliable cooperation with every client

guarantee.title: Guarantee
guarantee.description: Full guarantee of product quality and safety

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Quick answers and assistance with any questions

minimal.title: Minimum Order
minimal.description: We only work with bulk orders – at least 20 tons.

footer.description: Wholesale of natural dried fruits, healing herbs gathered from the mountains, and delicious nuts grown under the sun of Uzbekistan. High quality and fast delivery are guaranteed.
footer.worldwide: Regardless of region or country — we deliver worldwide.
